titleStmt.title: The courte of ciuill courtesie fitly furnished with a pleasant porte of stately phrases and pithie precepts, assembled in the behalfe of all younge gentlemen and others that are desirous to frame their behauiour according to their estates at all times and in all companies, therby to purchase worthy prayse of their inferiours and estimation and credite amonge theyr betters / out of Italian by S.R. Gent.
titleStmt.author: S. R. (Simon Robson), d. 1617.
Rowlands, Samuel, 1570?-1630?

notesStmt.note: Also published with title: A new yeeres gift, the courte ...

Dedication purports author to be Bengalassa del Mont. Prisacchi Retta, however, work is generally ascribed to Robson, and sometimes (wrongly) attributed to Samuel Rowlands--Cf. STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
